title: 1913 Pirates spring training postcard for sale
author: drumback

posts.post_title: 1913 Pirates spring training postcard for sale
posts.post_content:
From 1913 spring training at Dawson Springs, KY, includes Hall of Famers Wagner, Clarke and Max Carey.  This postcard is from the personal estate of Max Carey, with handwritten notations by Carey on the back.  The LOA signed by Carey is a copy, not the original.  SOLD.
[url]drumback2@gmail.com[/url]

I'll take it.  PM sent

Mike
Boy, that was quick. Cool piece.
